mapper.sql: orc_number, id, create_time, update_time, user_id, status, recycle_user_id, orc_url, site_name, site_id, orc_type
mapper.insert: insert into orc ( orc_number, create_time, update_time, user_id, status, recycle_user_id, orc_url, site_name, site_id, orc_type) values ( #{orcNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recycleUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orcUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select
from orc where orc_number= #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id= #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from orc where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status="3"
mapper.update: update orc set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recycle_user_id = #{recycleUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, orc_url = #{orcUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_name = #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, orc_type = #{orcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update orc set status = "1" where id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
